whatEventAreYouLookingFor: What event are you looking for?
name: Name
subject: Subject
thankYouDescription: Thank you for reaching out to us! We have received your message and will be in touch shortly. We value your interest and look forward to assisting you.
changePhoneDescription: Enter the new phone number you want to be asociated with your PIN account. As soon as you hit “NEXT”, you’ll be prompted to enter the OTP recieved on the new number.
pleaseEnterOtpSendToPhoneNumberYouHaveAd: Please enter OTP sent to the phone number you've added
cancelBookingDescription: We're sorry to see you go. Are you sure you want to cancel your booking?
deleteAccountDescription:
Are you sure you want to delete account?
Deleting your account will remove all of your information from our database. This cannot be undone.
volunteerDescription: Becoming a volunteer for our event is a rewarding experience that lets you give back to the community and gain valuable skills. Join us today to make a difference and create memorable experiences for all attendees.
